title: Episode 302: Gather
description: This week on ﻿Eat Your Words﻿, host Cathy Erway is joined by chef, author, and food writer Gill Meller. In his first book, ﻿Gather﻿, Meller showcases 120 recipes inspired by British seasonal cooking, and the landscapes in which he lives and works.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
